system_url.title: System URL
system_url.description: The base URL of the SAP Cloud for Customer instance. For example, https://c4c.instance.sap.com

basic_user.title: Basic Auth Username
basic_user.description: The username for the Communication User. The Communication User must already exist in SAP Cloud for Customer and used for all of the Communication Arrangements (used to expose APIs) you want to register in the Extension Factory

basic_password.title: Basic Auth Password
basic_password.description: The password for the Communication User in SAP Cloud for Customer

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the ODATA services and the event catalog should be registered for consumption
